description.en: Gives +1% Skill Damage, +3% MP and FP Consumption Decrease when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.
description.ar: Gives +1% Skill Damage, +3% MP and FP Consumption Decrease when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.
description.br: Concede um aumento de +1% de Dano de Habilidades e +3% de Redução do Consumo de Mana & Foco quando aplicada em Arma ou Escudo perfurado.
description.cns: Gives +1% Skill Damage, +3% MP and FP Consumption Decrease when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.
description.de: Verleiht +1% Skill Schaden, +3% MP und FP Verbrauchsverringerung wenn angewendet auf eine gesockelte Waffe oder Schild.

description.fr: Dégâts des Compétences augmentée de +1% et consommation des PM & PF diminuée de +3%, en glissant la carte dans un emplacement percé de votre arme ou armure.
description.id: Memberikan +1% Kerusakan Skill, +3% Pengurangan Konsumsi MP dan FP saat diterapkan pada senjata atau perisai yang tertembus.
description.it: Gives +1% Skill Damage, +3% MP and FP Consumption Decrease when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.

description.th: +1% พลังโจมตี Skill ,การใช้ MP และ FP ลดลง +3% เมื่อใส่ลงในอาวุธหรือโล่ที่ถูกเจาะแล้ว
